tag_list: online-marketing, vantage-media, oversee-net, online-advertising, performance-marketing, leadgen, lead-generation, pay-per-click, general-management, marketing, product-management
overview:
Sumant Sridharan, Vice President of Marketing, oversees all marketing initiatives including corporate branding, public relations, portal strategies, and new verticals for Vantage Media. Prior to Vantage, Sumant was a member of the leadership team of Oversee.net, where he led product marketing and development and subsequently was the General Manager for the companyâ€™s travel and social networking businesses. Over the last 12 years, Sumant has held leadership positions in online marketing, product management, and technology with companies like Yahoo!, The .tv Corporation, and Hewlett-Packard. Sumant began his career in management consulting leading large-scale systems implementations with Ernst & Young.

Sumant holds a BS in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science and BA in Economics from UC Berkeley as well as an MBA with honors from the UCLA Anderson School of Management.
